# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(core-libs-diagnostics)
target_link_libraries(core-libs-diagnostics PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  core-libs-common
  storage-core-protos
  cpp-lwtrace-mon
  cpp-actors-prof

  cpp-histogram-hdr
  cpp-json-writer
  library-cpp-logger
  library-cpp-lwtrace
  cpp-monlib-dynamic_counters
  cpp-monlib-service
  monlib-service-pages
  service-pages-tablesorter
  client-cpp-logger
)
